title: The Radeon VII - In An ALL AMD PC Build!
tags: how to build a gaming pc
description: Without really realizing it, we set out to build our first all-AMD PC gaming & productivity build of 2019.  It was originally for a triple monitor setup video but this Radeon VII (or is it Radeon 7?) gaming PC morphed into something amazing!  :)   Check out or full review here:    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  AMD 2600X:   B450 Tomahawk:   DeepCool Castle AIO:   Team Vulcan Dark:   Team Dark Pro:   Samsung 970 Evo:   Samsung 970 Pro:    NZXT H400:  NZXT H400i:    Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by AMD. This video is sponsored by NZXT. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main 4K Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second 4K Camera -  $700 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #radeonvii #amdradeon7 #hardwarecanucks #gamingpcbuild
